thread.title: Evidence that we need the Purple Line
thread.title_full: Evidence that we need the Purple Line - The Washington Post

author: washingtonpost.com
title: Evidence that we need the Purple Line
text:
Work on a Purple Line station tunnel in Silver Spring in May. (Bill O'Leary/Washington Post) October 2 at 6:15 PM The letters critical of the Purple Line and its expected ridership did not mention the most obvious evidence of the need for it: the relatively parallel F4 Metrobus line between New Carrollton and Silver Spring [“ How many will ride Purple Line? ,” letters, Oct. 1]. I am quite sure the loudest of these critics has never tried to get a seat on these buses, which are packed despite their frequent scheduling.
James Churchill , Alexandria
